required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multicenter Open-Label Single-Arm Multi-Cohort Phase I Study of BCD-100 in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter Open-Label Single-Arm Multi-Cohort Phase I Study of Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics, Safety, and Immunogenicity of BCD-100 (JSC BIOCAD, Russia) in Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: A Multicenter Open-Label Single-Arm Multi-Cohort Phase I Study of Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics, Safety, and Immunogenicity of BCD-100 (JSC BIOCAD, Russia) in Patients with Advanced Solid Tumors

primary_outcome.description: Pilot efficacy assessment is not the primary objective of this study and will be conducted by surrogate endpoints describing the direct antitumor effect of the drug. • ORR (CR + PR) after 85 days of therapy with BCD-100.

arm_group.description: Patients who receive BCD-100 in a dose of 0.3 mg/kg
Patients who receive BCD-100 in a dose of 1 mg/kg
Patients who receive BCD-100 in a dose of 3 mg/kg
Patients who receive BCD-100 in a dose of 10 mg/kg

facility.name: "Russian Cancer Research Center named after N.N. Blokhin "of the Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation
State budgetary health care institution "St. Petersburg Clinical Scientific and Practical Center of Specialized Medical Assistance (Oncological)"
